attributes.action: Kenneth Noye should never be released
attributes.additional_details:
Kenneth Noye a killer gangster who was jailed `for life` in 2000 should never be released from jail.

Convicted of stabbing a police officer to death in 1985, handling Brink`s-Mat gold in 1986, and murdering Stephen Cameron in 2000, Noye has repeatedly demonstrated in action not words that he is a callous murdering hoodlum who should never be released.
I hope that the Home Secretary will intervene in the judicial service and halt the effrontery that could see him released.
